title: Environment
summary: Where is this website placed? How is the environment? Is it made for busy environments like factory or light places like for shopping.
before: We need to have basic Idea about the project, where is it being used who are using it.
after: We will have clear idea about the environment where the website will be used.

key_steps.text: What do you know about the place where the website is going to be used? Is it a busy place or not?
Will it be used in any special space? does it need you to be in a certain place to use the website?
If yes, go to the place where the website will be used, look at what users of the website are working on or doing in that place. How the website fits in that place?
